42000000.English_Text:
What a delicious-looking fruit!
Thank you.
42000000.Chinese_Text:
果实看起来很好吃！
谢谢~

42000001.English_Text:
Finally I can
get some bait!
42000001.Chinese_Text:
这样就能得到
诱饵了！

42000002.English_Text:
Oh, shiny stuff!
Thank you, purr!
42000002.Chinese_Text:
喔，闪亮的东西喵！
谢谢喵！

42000003.Chinese_Text:
喔~喔呜喔~
谢谢~喔呜喔~

42000004.English_Text:
Finally, I can have
peace of mind.
42000004.Chinese_Text:
终于能恢复
内心的平静了！

42000005.English_Text:
Take a look at this lotus leaf umbrella.
Nice, isn't it? Hah hah!
42000005.Chinese_Text:
看看莲叶雨伞！
不错吧？？哈哈哈！

42000006.English_Text:
Hah, this won't make up for everything,
but still, you deserve a reward.
42000006.Chinese_Text:
唉，还是会很难...
不过我会给你奖励。

42000007.Chinese_Text:
哼哼...哼哼...
看来稍微好一点了！

42000008.English_Text:
I knew it'd be of poor quality.
But still, thank you.
42000008.Chinese_Text:
果然品质不够好。
不过还是辛苦了。

42000009.English_Text:
Wow, this is good!
Here's your reward!
42000009.Chinese_Text:
哎哟~商品到了！
这是奖励！

42000010.English_Text:
My dear turtles,
please don't get sick, meow.
42000010.Chinese_Text:
乌龟们~
不要生病喵！

42000011.English_Text:
Now I can see the fish!
Thank you so much.
42000011.Chinese_Text:
现在看到鱼了！
非常感谢。

42000012.English_Text:
Good job, mrrow!
You protected the ruins!
42000012.Chinese_Text:
辛苦了喵！
我们守住遗址了喵！

42000013.English_Text:
This...?!
I don't know what it is... Heh...
42000013.Chinese_Text:
这是？！
我不清楚喵...哈哈...

42000014.English_Text:
Wow, how marvelous!
Thank you so much.
42000014.Chinese_Text:
哇哈！这可真奇妙！
谢谢。

42000015.English_Text:
Finally, the cute sheep
can find peace!
42000015.Chinese_Text:
现在这些可爱的羊
也找到了和平！

42000016.English_Text:
This has a weird smell,
but thanks anyway!
42000016.Chinese_Text:
虽然有奇特的气味，
不过还是谢谢你！

42000017.English_Text:
I knew I could count on you.
Here's your reward.
42000017.Chinese_Text:
果然姜还是老的辣。
这是奖励。

42000018.English_Text:
Such a beautiful red color.
Thank you.
42000018.Chinese_Text:
这红色真是漂亮。
非常感谢~

42000019.English_Text:
Look at this luminous gold color!
Wow, thank you!
42000019.Chinese_Text:
闪亮的黄金色！
哇，非常感谢~

42000020.English_Text:
This is it, meow!
Thank you so much!
42000020.Chinese_Text:
就是这个喵！没错喵！！
太谢谢你了喵！！

42000021.English_Text:
This should do.
I owe you one.
42000021.Chinese_Text:
这样就够了。
这次是我欠你了。

42000022.English_Text:
This is definitely an interesting weapon.
Thank you.
42000022.Chinese_Text:
真是有趣的武器。
谢谢。

42000023.English_Text:
Why is this popular?
I have no idea!
42000023.Chinese_Text:
这为什么会流行呢...？
真是搞不懂！

42000024.English_Text:
This should do.
It serves you right, you evil <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Blue Bandits</>!
42000024.Chinese_Text:
这样应该就够了。
活该，苍盗团的混蛋们！！

42000025.English_Text:
It's still too difficult to use the trail,
but it's better than before.
42000025.Chinese_Text:
还不能去步行路呢。
不过已经好多了！

42000026.English_Text:
Oh, thank you.
I really appreciate it.
42000026.Chinese_Text:
哎哟，谢谢你。
真是非常感谢。

42000027.English_Text:
Hm... It has a weird stench.
Does this really work?
42000027.Chinese_Text:
嗯...气味真奇妙。
这有效果吗...？

42000028.Original_Text: (...왠지 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>바롱</>이라면 \n<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>수목 정령</>을 해치지 않고 \n가지를 얻었을 거 같군)
42000028.English_Text:
<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Tree Spirit</>, I'm sorry, mrrow!
It was the adventurer, not me!
42000028.Chinese_Text:
树木精灵对不起喵！
都是冒险家做的喵！

42000029.English_Text:
It serves them right!
Thank you so much.
42000029.Chinese_Text:
真是痛快。
非常感谢。

42000030.English_Text:
Thanks to you,
the animals will be able to sleep in relative comfort.
42000030.Chinese_Text:
奸恶的偷猎团坏蛋们！
感受动物们的痛苦吧！

42000031.English_Text:
You're pretty good.
Thank you for your help.
42000031.Chinese_Text:
实力不错。
你起到了很大帮助。

42000032.English_Text:
You even took care of <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Elite Hollows</>.
Not bad.
42000032.Chinese_Text:
竟然连染患也干掉了。
你的实力很不错。

42000033.Original_Text: (충분히 모았다.\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>균열의 흔적</>을 연구하여\n대책을 찾을 수 있기를...)
42000033.English_Text:
Wow, thank you so much.
You've collected so many!
42000033.Chinese_Text:
哎呀~真是谢谢你。
你搜集了很多呢！

42000034.English_Text:
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Gray Breeze</> knows nothing about this, right?
That's a relief.
42000034.Chinese_Text:
没有被灰色疾风发现吧？
呼...谢谢。

42000035.English_Text:
This is decent leather.
Here's your reward.
42000035.Chinese_Text:
找到了不错的皮呢。
这是奖励。

42000036.English_Text:
Wow, thank you!
I'll try really hard not to lose it again.
42000036.Chinese_Text:
哎哟，谢谢你。
我以后会小心不再丢掉的...

42000038.English_Text:
The voices of the spirits...
How come they've grown louder, meow?
42000038.Chinese_Text:
灵魂们的声音
好像...变得更大了喵？！

42000039.English_Text:
You Dokkaebis, it serves you right!
Hah hah!
42000039.Chinese_Text:
鬼怪，活该。
啊哈哈，啊哈哈哈。

42000040.Original_Text: (이 정도면 충분해.\n균열에 대한 실마리를 \n찾을 수 있으면 좋을텐데)
42000040.English_Text:
Oh, this seems like a nice specimen.
I'll look into it right away.
42000040.Chinese_Text:
喔，这个标本真不错。
我马上就开始调查~

42000041.English_Text:
Thank you, plog!
Ah, where's my luggage?
42000041.Chinese_Text:
谢谢呱！
啊，我没有行李呱！

42000042.English_Text:
Thank you.
I must reclaim my village, plog!
42000042.Chinese_Text:
谢谢呱！
我们需要找回村庄呱！！

42000043.English_Text:
I must reclaim my village, plog!
Oops, I mean, thanks!
42000043.Chinese_Text:
我们需要找回村庄呱！！
不，不对，谢谢！

42000044.Original_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>수양</>의 협행을 완료했다. \n대부분 탐사에 필요한\n자원을 수집하는 의뢰였네)
42000044.English_Text:
Take this reward given to you
in the name of the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Sol Seekers</>.
42000044.Chinese_Text:
这是以搜阳的名义给予的
特别奖励。

42000045.English_Text:
You're pretty good, adventurer.
Here's a special reward for you.
42000045.Chinese_Text:
你这个冒险家实力不错。
这是特别奖励。

42000046.English_Text:
You saved the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Peach Blossom</>.
I hope you won't mind helping us again later!
42000046.Chinese_Text:
您真是桃花商廛的恩人。
下次也拜托了！

42000047.English_Text:
You're a good adventurer, meow.
Okay, it's time I hold up my end.
42000047.Chinese_Text:
好棒的冒险家喵！
那么我遵守约定了喵~

42000048.Original_Text: (휴, 힘들었다. <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>금경철문</>이\n더 좋은 무기를 만드는데\n도움이 되었다면 좋겠어)
42000048.Chinese_Text:
实力不错！
来，这是奖励！！

42000049.English_Text:
Thank you, adventurer. 
You're the hero of the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Fish Network</>!
42000049.Chinese_Text:
谢谢，冒险家大人。
大鱼坊的英雄！

42000050.English_Text:
Everyone's singing your praises.
Here, take your reward.
42000050.Chinese_Text:
大家对你赞不绝口呢。
啊，这是奖励。

42000051.English_Text:
(It's not here.
I should check the <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>other side of the lake</>.)
42000051.Chinese_Text:
（不在这里...
去湖对面看看吧。）

42000052.Original_Text: (어디 보자... 여기 어딘가 \n<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>서인족</>이 무기를 모아둔\n상자가 있을 것 같은데...)
42000052.English_Text:
(Not here, either.
I see another Hedgie Nest
in the trees.)
42000052.Chinese_Text:
（又白跑了一趟。
那边的树中间
也有一个刺猬巢穴。）

42000054.Original_Text: (좋아! 이 정도면 \n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>약초</>를 채집할 수 \n있을 것 같아)
42000054.Chinese_Text:
（好！这种程度的话
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>药草</>可以采集
）

42000055.Chinese_Text:
（周围的威胁
充分消除了）

42000056.English_Text:
(Let's see. There must be a 
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>weapon chest</> somewhere...)
42000056.Chinese_Text:
（让我看看。
应该有武器箱子</>…）

42000058.English_Text:
(This is enough.
Now, let's retrieve the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Botzym</>)
42000058.Chinese_Text:
（这样就足够了。
现在<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>回收包袱</>）

42000059.Chinese_Text:
（妨碍的<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>斗夜团</>
充分处理了）

42000060.English_Text:
(The threats around me
have been sufficiently removed.
Let's collect <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Suwa's luggage</>)
42000060.Chinese_Text:
（行李周围的威胁
充分消除了。
收集和行李</>）

42000061.Original_Text: (휴~ 힘들었다. 그나저나, \n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>난파선</>에 타고 있던 \n사람들은 어떻게 됐을까?)
42000061.English_Text:
(Huh, it was hard. By the way, what happened to the 
people on the 
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>wreck</>?)
42000061.Chinese_Text:
（呼~好累啊话说回来，
乘坐遇难船</>的
人们怎么样了？）

42000062.English_Text:
(I got enough. 
It's poisonous, so 
You shouldn't eat it carelessly)
42000062.Chinese_Text:
（得到了很多。
听说有毒性，不能随便吃。）

42000063.English_Text:
(This is enough. 
The taste is excellent,
I'll have to try it sometime)
42000063.Chinese_Text:
（这程度就足够了。
味道好极了，
什么时候尝一尝吧）

42000064.Chinese_Text:
（终于结束了。
<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>调查员</>们可以安全地参观
）

42000065.English_Text:
(Let's take a break from safety
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Gather half moon grass</>!)
42000065.Chinese_Text:
（趁着安全的空隙
采集半月草</>！）

42000066.English_Text:
(This is it! 
Does it smell good?)

42000067.English_Text:
(I have collected enough.
It's sturdy, so it would be perfect if I made it into armor.)
42000067.Chinese_Text:
（充分收集起来了。
因为很结实，用盔甲制作的话正好。）

42000069.English_Text:
(I saved them all.
It was a pretty tricky mission)
42000069.Chinese_Text:
（都找到了。
任务相当复杂）

42000070.English_Text:
(This should be enough for all of the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Discipline</>
to be satisfied)
42000070.Chinese_Text: （这种程度的话<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>首阳大院</>全部都可以吃饱）

42000071.English_Text:
(Phew, it's a bit safer.
Come on, let's gather <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Swamp Herb</>)
42000071.Chinese_Text:
（呼，有点安全了。
快点<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>采集沼泽药草</>）

42000072.Original_Text: (하얗고 예쁜 꽃이네.\n진흙 속에서 자랐다는 게\n믿기지 않을 정도야)
42000072.Chinese_Text:
（又白又漂亮的花啊。
长在泥土里，简直不敢相信。）

42001000.English_Text:
We should store it dried
and in a safe place.
42001000.Chinese_Text:
需要在安全的地方保管，
同时保持干燥。

42001001.Original_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>밀림 거미</>의 거미줄은 \n정말 굵고 튼튼하군. \n연구할 가치가 있어 보여)
42001001.English_Text:
I wish there was
an efficient way to produce
Spider Web Protein.
42001001.Chinese_Text:
如果有高效生产
蜘蛛丝蛋白质的方法该有多好。

42001002.English_Text:
This is some good leather.
I'll have it delivered
to the masters.
42001002.Chinese_Text:
真是优质的皮。
我会尽快交给匠人们。

42001003.English_Text:
Amazing, meow!
How did you find it?
Thank you so much, mrrow!
42001003.Chinese_Text: 真是了不起喵！到底是怎么找到的喵！！真是太感谢了喵！！

42001004.English_Text:
Thank you!
I'll have the engineers deployed
immediately.
42001004.Chinese_Text: 谢谢！我会马上投入工兵。

42001005.English_Text:
Everything is going as planned.
Thank you!
42001005.Chinese_Text: 一切都如作战计划。谢谢！

42001006.Original_Text: (충분히 얻었다. \n<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>오똑 발발이</>의 풀은 \n짙은 연두색을 낼 것 같아)
42001006.English_Text:
I'm looking forward to seeing
what color will come out!
42001006.Chinese_Text: 我很期待会做出什么颜色！

42001007.English_Text:
It's a little quieter now,
but it's still too loud.
42001007.Chinese_Text: 虽然比以前好一些，但还是很吵。

42001008.English_Text:
Why is he
so fond of this?
I really have no idea.
42001008.Chinese_Text: 为什么这么喜欢这个...我也不清楚。

42001009.Original_Text: (<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>거북알</>을 구했다. \n남획으로 인해 멸종되는 \n일은 없어야 할 텐데...)
42001009.English_Text:
We don't have any legal ground
to stand on in this matter,
so this is the best we can do.
42001009.Chinese_Text: 我们没有什么约束力...除此之外没有多少办法。

42001010.English_Text:
We should quickly find
something we can use
to replace the turtle shell.
42001010.Chinese_Text: 我们需要尽快找到可以代替乌龟贝壳的东西。

42001011.English_Text:
May I ask you for favors again
from time to time?
42001011.Chinese_Text: 以后可以常常拜托你吗？

42001012.English_Text:
We'll try to keep
the people from entering.
Thank you.
42001012.Chinese_Text: 我们会限制人们的出入。谢谢。

42001013.English_Text:
Thank you.
This will make
a great basket.
42001013.Chinese_Text: 谢谢。有这些就能制作优质的篮子了。

42001014.Original_Text: (<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>봇짐</>을 찾았다. \n거점 주변이 조금 더 \n안전해지면 좋을 텐데)
42001014.English_Text:
Thank you. I didn't want
to go that way... But I
have no other choice.
42001014.Chinese_Text: 谢谢。我也不想去那边的路...但又不能不走，真是难办。

42001016.English_Text:
Until the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Scarlet Masks</>
are no more!
42001016.Chinese_Text: 直到赤匪派组织崩溃的那天为止！

42001017.English_Text:
We must find
a way to eliminate
the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>illusion</>.
42001017.Chinese_Text: 我们需要找到有效清除幻影的办法。

42001018.Original_Text: (...독도 약에 쓰이니\n<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>투연초</>도 연구해 볼\n가치가 있을 거야)
42001018.English_Text:
I will investigate and keep my mind open
to all possibilities, meow!
42001018.Chinese_Text: 我会考虑所有的可能性进行调查喵！

42001019.English_Text:
The <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Merchant Owner</> won't be
too happy about spending money
on something like this.
42001019.Chinese_Text: 商廛老板肯定不想在这种地方花钱。

42001020.English_Text:
Oh, thank you.
Now, I can
get there safely!
42001020.Chinese_Text: 了不起！今后也请多多关照。

42001021.Original_Text: (됐다. 이 정도면 \n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>바롱</>이 안전하게 조사를 \n진행할 수 있을 거야)
42001021.English_Text:
We will resume
our investigation, meow!
42001021.Chinese_Text: 我们要重新进行调查喵！

42001022.English_Text:
Wow! This will be able save
one or two more lives.
42001022.Chinese_Text: 喔！这样就可以多救一两个人了。

42001023.English_Text:
Thank you!
You've been a great help.
42001023.Chinese_Text: 谢谢！这对我的帮助很大。

42001024.Original_Text: (드디어 끝마쳤군.\n<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>혈비패</>는 뭘 얻기 위해\n묘지에 온 걸까?)
42001024.English_Text:
Their numbers decreased by a lot.
Thank you!
42001024.Chinese_Text: 这样就能继续进行研究了。

42001025.English_Text:
The quality seems exceptional.
Thank you.

42001026.English_Text:
Wowzers! Now this is fine quality.
Thank you so much.

42001027.Original_Text: (이 정도면 충분하겠지? \n<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>담인초</>는 봐도 봐도 \n적응이 되지 않는군)
42001027.English_Text:
The <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Nepenthes</> might look disgusting,
but I will investigate to see
if they have any medicinal effects, purr!
42001027.Chinese_Text: 啖人草虽然很恶心，但只要有药效就需要继续调查喵！

42001028.Original_Text: (휴, 겨우 끝마쳤다. \n<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>낙원족</>은 공격성이 강해서 \n상대하기가 만만치 않군)
42001028.English_Text:
It's not the ultimate solution,
but still, thanks!
42001028.Chinese_Text: 虽然不是根本性的解决方案...但还是谢谢你！

42001029.English_Text:
It looks fine to me.
Hahaha!

42001031.Original_Text: (휴, 임무를 완수했다. \n언뜻 보면 수풀처럼 보여 \n더 위험한 것 같아)
42001031.English_Text:
The <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Edeta</> Members
are being deployed and should be
sorted out soon.
42001031.Chinese_Text: 艾瑞达队员们也会参加战斗，很快就会结束。

42001032.English_Text:
This is some fine oil!
You have my gratitude.

42001033.English_Text:
Oh! How did you
get this goat milk?
It's amazing, purrr.
42001033.Chinese_Text: 喔！到底是怎么获得山羊奶的喵？真了不起喵。

42001034.English_Text:
I'll be able to create
a good brush with
this straight, fine hair.
42001034.Chinese_Text: 我需要搜集笔直纤细的毛制作优质的毛笔。

42001035.Original_Text: (휴~ 힘들었다. 이 지역은 \n<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>묘면족</>과 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>낙원족</> 때문에 \n조용할 틈이 없구나)
42001035.English_Text:
It's noisy
around here because of
the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Lapriels</> and <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Simyus</>.
42001035.Chinese_Text: 这个地区深受兔面族与乐猿族的侵扰。

42001036.English_Text:
The safety of the tourists
should always be
our top priority.
42001036.Chinese_Text: 我们需要最优先考虑游客们的安全。

42001037.English_Text:
There will be a lot of added value
if the artisans add
their personal touch to it.
42001037.Chinese_Text: 加上匠人们的手艺，将会创造惊人的附加价值。

42001038.English_Text:
This leather seems to be of fine quality,
judging by how durable it looks.

42001039.English_Text:
They might not have any harmful intentions,
but they're still our enemy.
42001039.Chinese_Text: 即使他们没有恶意，仍然是我们的敌人。

42001040.English_Text:
You just can't cut it off
once you've had a taste of it! Argh!
42001040.Chinese_Text: 这只要试过一次就绝对无法停止！呃啊！

42001041.English_Text:
It might smell a little strange...
But it'll definitely work,
mrrow!
42001041.Chinese_Text:
气味有点奇怪...
但肯定有效果喵！

42001042.English_Text:
You're a trustworthy adventurer.
Here's a special reward for you.
42001042.Chinese_Text:
真是值得信赖的冒险家。
这是特别奖励。

42001043.English_Text:
You're really skilled!
Here's your reward!
42001043.Chinese_Text:
你的实力真是出众！
来，这里奖励！！

42001044.English_Text:
Thank you, as always.
I really appreciate it!
42001044.Chinese_Text:
每次都很感谢。
那就拜托了！

42001045.English_Text:
This is a special reward
from the Sol Seekers captain.
42001045.Chinese_Text:
这是搜阳队长
给的特别奖励。

42001046.Original_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>영교원</> 협행을 완수했다. \n이정도면 협행 전문가라 \n불릴 수도 있겠는걸?)
42001046.English_Text:
You're a good adventurer, meow.
Okay, it's time I hold up my end.
42001046.Chinese_Text:
好棒的冒险家喵！
那么我遵守约定了喵~

42001048.English_Text:
Everyone's singing your praises.
Here, take your reward.
42001048.Chinese_Text:
大家对你赞不绝口呢。
啊，这是奖励。

42001049.English_Text:
(The surrounding threats have 
enough been removed.
Let's find the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Secret Book</>)
42001049.Chinese_Text:
（充分消除了周围的威胁。
寻找秘方</>）

42001050.English_Text:
(This gave me enough time to 
gather 
the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>turtle eggs</>)
42001050.Chinese_Text:
（这种程度的话<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>龟卵</>
采集的时间
充分赚了）

42001051.Chinese_Text:
（好了！现在采集坚硬的
<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>植物茎</>）

42001052.English_Text:
(Phew, we killed them all. 
Let's recover <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Botzym</> in this gap!)
42001052.Chinese_Text:
（呼，都处理掉了。
趁这个空隙<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>回收包袱</>！）

42001053.English_Text:
(This is enough.
Now let's get rid of the <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>garbage</>?)
42001053.Chinese_Text:
（这种程度就足够了。
现在<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>清理一下垃圾</>吧？）

42001054.Chinese_Text:
（<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>龟卵</>消除了周围的
威胁）

42002000.English_Text:
We don't know
when we might need that camp
again, do we?
42002000.Chinese_Text: 以后可能需要再次把那里用作营地吧？

42002001.English_Text:
If we can't do anything about our ears...
I guess we need to
eliminate the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Mandaravas</>, right?
42002001.Chinese_Text: 如果无法改变我们的耳朵...只能让曼陀罗花绝种吧？

42002002.Original_Text: (임무를 끝마쳤다. \n훈련생들이 다치지 않고 \n훈련할 수 있을 거야)
42002002.English_Text:
If an <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Oduksini</> gives you a riddle
that you can't answer,
just turn around and run.
42002002.Chinese_Text: 如果夜鬼给出谜题而你不知道答案的话，不要回答，一定要马上逃走。

42002003.Original_Text: (후, 충분히 구했다.\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>독</>을 해독하기 위해\n<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>독</>이 필요한 상황이라니)
42002003.English_Text:
A powerful poison
always has its uses.

42002004.English_Text:
Thank you.
Isn't it great that the field is
safe and sound now?
42002004.Chinese_Text: 谢谢。荒野既安全又干净，很好吧？

42002005.Original_Text: (<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>여우털</>을 모두 모았다. \n이 정도면 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>명혜단</>이 \n붓을 만들기에 충분할 거야)
42002005.English_Text:
It's very straight and fine,
and makes for
great brush material.
42002005.Chinese_Text: 如果这就是笔直纤细的材料，应该可以制作优质的毛笔。

42002006.English_Text:
We've eliminated the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Oduksinis</>
whenever we could,
but there's still a lot of them left.
42002006.Chinese_Text: 我们也在尽力抽出时间处理夜鬼，但数量太多了。

42002007.English_Text:
Thanks for helping, meow!
I'll see you around!

42002008.English_Text:
The <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Peach Blossom</> should
monopolize this black color.
42002008.Chinese_Text: 桃花商廛要独占这种黑色。

42002009.English_Text:
If this is processed well,
it will sell for a high price.
42002009.Chinese_Text: 经过加工之后应该能卖个好价钱。

42002010.English_Text:
I'd like to thank you
on behalf of the many others you've helped.
42002010.Chinese_Text: 真是了不起。下次也可以请你帮忙吗？

42002011.English_Text:
I can't quit.
It's in a researcher's nature
to try to discover the truth.
42002011.Chinese_Text: 我没有办法放弃。查明真相就是研究者的使命。

42002012.English_Text:
Why are there so many <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Night Gargoyles</>? Hiss!
There're even more than before, meow!
42002012.Chinese_Text: 为什么会有这么多夜禽喵！这段时间数量又增加了喵！

42002013.English_Text:
It seems to be some useless grass,
but I will investigate it
thoroughly, mrrow!
42002013.Chinese_Text: 有一些看似完全没用的草，不过仍然需要精密调查喵！

42002014.English_Text:
Thank you.
I'll pass it on to the investigation team
and have them look into it.
42002014.Chinese_Text: 谢谢。我会转交给审查班进行调查。

42002015.Original_Text: (제법 많이 모았다.\n생, 건조, 반건조, 냉동까지\n시험할 수 있을 양이다)
42002015.English_Text:
I may be crazy about herbs,
but we'd better check
if it's safe, meow!
42002015.Chinese_Text: 先不提药效，需要先调查一下危不危险喵！

42002016.English_Text:
We'll also go
and get rid of them.
Thank you.

42002017.Original_Text: (휴, 이 정도면 충분해. \n<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>도화상전</>은 염료 개발에 \n많은 투자를 하는 것 같군)
42002017.English_Text:
Looks good to me.
I should also think about
how to domesticate this.
42002017.Chinese_Text: 看起来不错。我们会考虑一下饲养的办法。

42002018.English_Text:
I hope I can get
at least one. That'll bring me
a huge profit.
42002018.Chinese_Text: 只要有一个成功，就能创造巨大利润。

42002019.Original_Text: (모두 모았다. <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>유강독모</>에 \n내성을 가진 물질이 있다면\n큰 도움이 될텐데...)
42002019.English_Text:
One day, we will drive
the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Tarite</> out!
42002019.Chinese_Text: 我们总有一天会赶走塔里特！

42002020.English_Text:
I find the <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Nepenthes</>
totally disgusting and repulsive.
42002020.Chinese_Text: 啖人草有些恶心，让人很反感。

42002021.English_Text:
Thank you.
I've brought enough
to use for now.
42002021.Chinese_Text: 谢谢。我带来了足够这次使用的分量。

42002022.English_Text:
This is good leather.
It'll make for
some quality parchment.
42002022.Chinese_Text: 真是优质的皮，应该能做出优质的羊皮纸。

42002023.English_Text:
It just looks like an old tool.
Even so, I should
still investigate it.
42002023.Chinese_Text: 看来只是老旧的工具，不过还是需要调查。

42002024.Original_Text: (<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>비옥 대지</>는 아직 위험한 \n곳이 많아서 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>바롱</>이 약초를 \n구하기 힘들 것 같아)
42002024.English_Text:
I need to test the medicine...
Are you interested, mrrow?
42002024.Chinese_Text: 我们需要试验药物...有兴趣喵？

42002025.Original_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>홍돈족</>을 쫓아냈다.\n하지만 그들이 <textColor=[110:216:175:255]>붉은 숲길</>을\n쉽게 포기할 것 같진 않다)
42002025.English_Text:
I hope it goes away somewhere
where I never have to see it again.
42002025.Chinese_Text: 真希望去一个看不到的地方。

42002026.Original_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>매화단</>의 장비에 비해서 \n투박해 보이지만, \n조사를 해볼 만은 하다)
42002026.English_Text:
Oh ho! I love it!
May I ask you again next time?
42002026.Chinese_Text: 哇！真是太棒了。可以再拜托一次吗？

42002027.English_Text:
If only the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Sol Seekers</>
had properly put a stop to them.
42002027.Chinese_Text: 如果搜阳帮忙阻止就再好不过了。

42002028.English_Text:
Good, I've been waiting for this.
Here's your reward.
42002028.Chinese_Text: 我一直在等，请收下奖励。

42002029.English_Text:
You're really skilled!
Here's your reward!
42002029.Chinese_Text:
你的实力真是出众！
来，这里奖励！！

42002030.English_Text:
Thank you, as always.
I really appreciate it!
42002030.Chinese_Text:
每次都很感谢。
那就拜托了！

42002031.English_Text:
This is a special reward
from the Sol Seekers captain.
42002031.Chinese_Text:
这是搜阳队长
给的特别奖励。

42002032.English_Text:
You're a good adventurer, meow.
Okay, it's time I hold up my end.
42002032.Chinese_Text:
好棒的冒险家喵！
那么我遵守约定了喵~

42002034.English_Text:
Everyone's singing your praises.
Here, take your reward.
42002034.Chinese_Text:
大家对你赞不绝口呢。
啊，这是奖励。

42002051.English_Text:
(이걸 후식으로 먹었다고?
소화에 도움이 되는 걸까?)
42002051.Chinese_Text:
（我吃了这晚餐？
它有助于消化吗？）

42002052.Original_Text: (이걸로 더 좋은 장비를\n만들 수 있다면 좋겠군)
42002052.English_Text:
(이걸로 더 좋은 장비를
만들 수 있다면 좋겠군)
42002052.Chinese_Text:
（我有更好的设备
我希望你能做到）

42002053.English_Text:
(독도 잘 쓰면
약으로 사용할 수 있구나)

42002054.English_Text:
(확실히 껍질이 딱딱해서
공격이 잘 먹히지 않겠어)
42002054.Chinese_Text:
（绝对壳很难
攻击将无法吃得很好）

42002057.Chinese_Text:
仪式）>仪式
我可以刺穿防守吗？

42002058.Chinese_Text:
（我看到了国家的情况......
让我们收集一次）

42002059.Chinese_Text:
为什么这武器
我想知道我是否使用过它）

42002061.Chinese_Text:
（周围有敌人）。
离开它是不容易的。

42002062.Original_Text: (조사도 좋지만...\n위험한 곳은 피하는 게 좋을 텐데)
42002062.English_Text:
(조사도 좋지만...
위험한 곳은 피하는 게 좋을 텐데)
42002062.Chinese_Text:
（조사좋좋사）
避免危险的地方会更好）

42002063.Chinese_Text:
（突然<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>蜘蛛</>
我很尴尬，我会逃跑。

42003002.Chinese_Text: （另外，<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>看门狗</>\n你有出色的警觉能力）

42003003.English_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>It will be helpful for \nresearch on the Black Dawn</>)
42003003.Chinese_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>这将对黑色黎明的\nresearch 有帮助</>)

42003004.English_Text: (Now the crew can get out safely.)

42003005.English_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>The Black Dawn</> would be a negative target for everyone)
42003005.Chinese_Text: （<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>黑色黎明</>对每个人来说都是一个负面目标）

42003006.Original_Text: (내가 줄 수 있는 도움은\n이게 전부인 것 같다)
42003006.English_Text: (I guess that's all I can help \n)

42003007.English_Text: (Is this <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Lotus leaf</> harmless to human body?)

42003008.English_Text: (Even if you know it's going to pop out, you'll be surprised...)
42003008.Chinese_Text: （即使你知道它会弹出，你也会感到惊讶......）

42003009.English_Text: (Now you should be able to \nfind <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>animal bones</>)

42003010.Chinese_Text: （这只是污垢。\n这项研究可行吗？）

42003011.English_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Myunghyedan</> is on an expedition to a dangerous place)
42003011.Chinese_Text: （<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Myunghyedan​​</> 正在前往危险的地方探险）

42003012.English_Text: (Now you should be able to find <textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Secret Book</>)
42003012.Chinese_Text: （现在你应该可以找到<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>秘密书</>）

42003013.Original_Text: (좋은 재료를 만들기 위해\n많은 연구를 하고 있구나!)
42003013.English_Text: (You are doing a lot of research \n to make good ingredients!)
42003013.Chinese_Text: （你正在做很多研究\n以制作好的原料！）

42003014.English_Text: (Okay! It seems that the crew safely escaped the \nforest)
42003014.Chinese_Text: （好吧！看来船员们安全地逃离了\nforest）

42003015.English_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Bear</> and <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Spider</>\n so defense is getting harder)
42003015.Chinese_Text: （<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Bear</> 和 <textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Spider</>\n 所以防御越来越难了）

42003016.Original_Text: (신입을 거치지 않고\n고참이 될 수는 없는 법이지)
42003016.English_Text: (You can't become a senior \n without going through a freshman)
42003016.Chinese_Text: （你不能不经过大一就成为大四\n）

42003018.Original_Text: (가죽이 좋아서가 아니라\n그냥 여러 개를 원하는 걸까?)
42003018.English_Text: (Not because I like leather\nI just want several?)
42003018.Chinese_Text: （不是因为我喜欢皮革\n我只想要几个？）

42003019.English_Text: (Why did he have to have a human face?)

42003021.English_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Barong</> will do a good job of collecting it, right?)

42003023.English_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Hyojo</>'s feather as a writing instrument?\nYou can use it like that)
42003023.Chinese_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Hyojo</>的羽毛作为书写工具？\n你可以这样使用)

42003024.English_Text: (Um? It smells bad. \n Gathering must be a lot of trouble)

42003025.English_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>How are you going to use the blood of metallurgy</>?)

42003026.English_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Myunghyedan</> is really researching a variety of things)
42003026.Chinese_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Myunghyedan​​</> 真的在研究各种各样的东西)

42003027.English_Text: (Now the operation will be \n a little easier, right?)

42003028.English_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>The number of poison worms</> has been reduced, so we can handle it now)
42003028.Chinese_Text: （<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>毒虫数量</>减少了，现在可以处理了）

42003029.English_Text: (Is this processed and used as a material?)

42003032.English_Text: (Ashes as a material? \n Wouldn't that have the opposite effect?)
42003032.Chinese_Text: （骨灰做材料？\n这不会有相反的效果吗？）

42003033.English_Text: (The merchants have to come to a place like this to work)

42003034.English_Text: (Humans like this? \nHow do you do that...)
42003034.Chinese_Text: （人类是这样的？\n你是怎么做到的......）

42003036.English_Text: (If you suddenly come out of your side, you must be surprised)
42003036.Chinese_Text: （如果你突然从你身边走出来，你一定很惊讶）

42003037.English_Text: (Is it possible to wash in water?)

42003039.English_Text: (If you drill a hole in here and blow on it, it makes a sound?)
42003039.Chinese_Text: （如果你在这里钻个洞吹气，它会发出声音吗？）

42003040.English_Text: (Now you can get to where the <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ereda</> crews are)
42003040.Chinese_Text: （现在你可以到达 <textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ereda</> 工作人员所在的位置）

42003041.Original_Text: (균열 연구란 게 결코\n쉬운 일은 아닌 것 같다)
42003041.English_Text: (Crack research is never an easy task)
42003041.Chinese_Text: （破解研究从来都不是一件容易的事）

42003042.English_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Weeping</> is suffering so much\nYou have to deal with it with care)
42003042.Chinese_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>哭泣</>太痛苦了\n你必须小心处理)

42003043.English_Text: (It won't be easy to deal with...)

42003045.English_Text: (It's not easy to break through \n I'll have to attack persistently)

42003046.Chinese_Text: （根据地区的不同，<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Burn</> 是否\nsomething 不同？

42003048.English_Text: (I wish I could find out information from this...)

42003049.English_Text: (What is this to \n<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>beasts</> who live well in nature...)
42003049.Chinese_Text: （这对在大自然中生活得很好的\n<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>野兽</>来说是什么……）

42003050.English_Text: (It's really endless.\nWhere does it come from?)

42003051.English_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Geumgyeongcheolmun</>'s weapon is also stolen from you)
42003051.Chinese_Text: （<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Geumgyeongcheolmun</> 的武器也从你那里偷走了）

42003053.Original_Text: (그냥 양이나 오리, 거위털을 쓰면 \n안 되는 건가?)
42003053.English_Text: (Isn't it okay to just use sheep, duck, or goose down?)
42003053.Chinese_Text: （只用绵羊、鸭子或鹅绒不是可以吗？）

42003054.English_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Pungbaekmun</> completed two collaborations. \nLet's go get a reward)
42003054.Chinese_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>风白门</>完成了两次合作。\n我们去领取奖励吧)

42003055.English_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Geumgyeongcheolmun</> completed two collaborations.\nWould you like to receive a reward?)
42003055.Chinese_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Geumgyeongcheolmun</> 完成了两次合作。\n你想获得奖励吗？)

42003056.Chinese_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>在<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>插图</>中完成了2次合作。\n让我们获得奖励)

42003057.English_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Suyang</>Completed the two collaborations requested by you.\nLet's go get the reward!)
42003057.Chinese_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>苏阳</>完成了你要求的两次合作。\n我们去领取奖励吧！)

42003058.English_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Young Gyowon</> performed \nCollaborative twice.\nWill the reward be well received?)
42003058.Chinese_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Young Gyowon</> 执行了两次\nCollaborative。\n奖励会收到吗？)

42003059.Original_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>명혜단</>에서 의뢰한 협행을 2건 완료했다. 보상을 확인해 보자)
42003059.English_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Completed 2 collaborations commissioned by Myunghyedan</>. Let's check the rewards)
42003059.Chinese_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>完成了明惠丹委托的2次合作</>。让我们看看奖励)

42003060.English_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ereda</> completed two collaborations requested.\nLet's get a reward)
42003060.Chinese_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Ereda</> 完成了两个请求的合作。\n让我们获得奖励)

42003061.Chinese_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Bisamun</>已完成 2 个\nCollaborative 要求的任务。

42003062.Chinese_Text: (<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>干燥树皮</>使其具有药用价值！)

42003064.Original_Text: (<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>약초</>를 얻는 게 쉬운 일은 아닌 것 같다)

42003065.English_Text: (It stretches well, so you can use it like this \n)
42003065.Chinese_Text: （它伸展得很好，所以你可以像这样使用它\n）

42003066.English_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Balbali</> is used in so many different places)

42003067.English_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Dohwasangjeon</> is a unique idea.\nIs that a way to make money?)
42003067.Chinese_Text: (<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>Dohwasangjeon</> 是一个独特的想法。\n这是赚钱的方式吗？)

42003069.English_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>Alligator</> There are many other dangerous things...)
42003069.Chinese_Text: (<textColor=[215:94:94:255]>鳄鱼</>还有很多其他危险的东西……)

42003070.Chinese_Text: （<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>projectile</> 是否在每个区域发生变化？）

42003072.Original_Text: (적은 무기 하나를 잃고, \n우린 무기 하나를 얻는 거로군)
42003072.English_Text: (Enemy loses one weapon, \nwe get one weapon)
42003072.Chinese_Text: （敌人失去了一件武器，\n我们得到了一件武器）

42003073.English_Text: (What did you eat to get this big?)

42003074.English_Text: (<textColor=[255:204:102:255]>Fat</> ingredients will be different for each animal)

42003076.Chinese_Text: （我可以用它来保存<textColor=[78:148:215:255]>风白门</>吗？）

42003077.English_Text: (<textColor=[110:216:175:255]>Securing hilly land</> would be very important)
